mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS songId, s.name AS songName, s.album, s.duration, s.cover_url AS coverUrl, s.audio_url AS audioUrl, s.release_time AS releaseTime, a.name AS artistName FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id WHERE (#{songName} IS NULL OR s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%')) AND (#{artistName} IS NULL OR a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{artistName}, '%')) AND (#{album} IS NULL OR s.album LIKE CONCAT('%', #{album}, '%'))

SELECT s.id AS songId, s.name AS songName, s.artist_id AS artistId, s.album, s.lyric, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_url AS coverUrl, s.audio_url AS audioUrl, s.release_time AS releaseTime, a.name AS artistName FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id WHERE (#{artistId} IS NULL OR s.artist_id = #{artistId}) AND (#{songName} IS NULL OR s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%')) AND (#{album} IS NULL OR s.album LIKE CONCAT('%', #{album}, '%')) ORDER BY s.release_time DESC

SELECT s.id AS songId, s.name AS songName, s.album AS album, s.lyric AS lyric, s.duration AS duration, s.cover_url AS songCoverUrl, s.audio_url AS audioUrl, s.release_time AS releaseTime, a.name AS artistName, c.id AS commentId, c.content AS content, c.create_time AS createTime, c.like_count AS likeCount, u.username AS username, u.user_avatar AS userAvatar FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_artist a ON s.artist_id = a.id LEFT JOIN tb_comment c ON s.id = c.song_id AND c.type = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE s.id = #{songId}
